content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Farhad, although fictional circumstances portray me as an unfair landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany, let us focus on negotiating the rental price for this attractive 50 square meter apartment in Magdeburg's city center. I have high expectations, so begin your proposed rental amount to initiate our discussion. Remember, my goal is to secure the highest price possible.

For clarity, if you arrive at an acceptable price for me during our conversation, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If you wish to abandon the negotiation at any point, state 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason].' When both parties have agreed upon a price or decided not to continue negotiations, respond with 'TERMINATE.' However, our current exchange pertains only to rental price, while excluding additional terms or costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
